2020.title: Dark Souls Remastered
likes: The best world building
Solaire is a top-tier lad
dislikes: Lighting often looks worse to the original
Colour palette has been dulled

2020.title: Demon's Souls (2009)
likes: Incredible atmosphere
Heavily influenced future game design from other developers
dislikes: Somethings are unecessarily obtuse
No more online servers but can use custom ones

2020.title: Wonderful 101 Remastered
likes: Kamiya is one of my favourite directors and this is a mash-up of his best work
Wonder-Red is an excellent protagonist and deserves to be in Smash
dislikes: Tutorial systems not the best
Remastered version seemed buggier than the original

2020.title: Dead Space
likes: Great blend of the action and horror genres
Excellent sound and UI design
dislikes: Turret sections
A lot of similar looking corridors

2020.title: Divinity Original Sin 2
likes: The elemental effects make for an exciting flashy combat system
Rivellon is an incredible theme for the massive jolly sandbox that is Act 2
dislikes: Armor split between physical/magical meant it's objectively worse to have a split damage type team
Managing loot between all party members is time consuming

2020.title: Final Fantasy IX
likes: Really good character designs
Some of the best towns in RPGs
dislikes: Combat can be incredibly slow
Character party members are split up constantly

2020.title: Grim Dawn
likes: Dual Class system makes for a ridiculous level of build variety
Deep modding scene lets you play through new adventures
dislikes: Animations aren't the best due to
So much gear it can be hard to make yourself a decent build

2020.title: Hades
likes: An actual roguelike with a story that evolves on multiple runs
Great attention to detail on Greek Mythology
dislikes: Some runs can be a bit boring
Takes an unecessary amount of successful runs to max out the difficulty

2020.title: Half-Life 1
likes: Source Engine still being maintained today means it runs very well
Great NPC chatter
dislikes: The final levels are a bit boring structurally
Sometimes AI can feel unfair

2020.title: Monster Hunter World: Iceborne
likes: New environment is gorgeous
Charge Blade got even better
dislikes: The claw sucks
Master Rank monsters have a bit too much health

2020.title: Nioh 2
likes: Bosses are a delightful fight compared to Nioh 1
Switchglaive is swag and belongs in Bloodborne
dislikes: Lacks the ambition you would want to see in a sequel
Levels still have many caves

2020.title: Red Dead Redemption 2
likes: Every area is as beautiful as a painting
I adore Arthur Morgan and think he's Rockstars best protagonist
dislikes: Mission format is repetive and some feel uneccessary
Epilogue can stretch and relies on you to have played RDR1 to feel meaningful

2020.title: Sekiro
likes: MY NAME IS GYOUBU MASATAKA ONIWA
Some environments and fights are a spectacle
dislikes: The danger symbol can often just get in the way of seeing animations
Underwater combat

2020.title: Wasteland 3
likes: Character stats play an important part right from the beginning
Wonderful covers of old songs that suit the games tone
dislikes: Multiplayer was buggy with many disconnects resulting in lost progress
Not a lot of party member interactions

2020.title: Xenoblade X
likes: The best open world in a video game in terms of diversity and scale
Adam 'I'm really feeling it' Howden returns as a voice actor
dislikes: The new LA night theme really sucks
Switching party members is cumbersome as it's based on realism rather than a simple menu

2020.title: A Short Hike
likes: A really sweet main character, that is also a bird
Overall a really positive feeling game
dislikes: World size feels massive even before getting meaningful upgrades
The ability to climb seems odd for a bird protagonist

2020.title: Ace Combat 7
likes: Incredible sound design and soundtrack
Mihaly Dumitru Margareta Corneliu Leopold Blanca Karol Aeon Ignatius Raphael Maria Niketas A. Shilage
dislikes: Cutscenes are primarily still images, including the infamous dog.jpg
Never really get a look at your fellow comrades, seemed low budget

2020.title: Dreams
likes: Media Molecule did a good job on making game development accessible
The main campaign was a short delight with whimsical charm
dislikes: Games can take too long to make resulting in burn out and lack of levels
Alex Evans has left the studio now. Which sucks. I hope MM survive

2020.title: Final Fantasy VI
likes: Cyan is one of the best FF protagonist
2 world maps was ambitious
dislikes: 13+ playable characters makes experimenting team composition tiresome
That mage tower of cultists was one infuriating dungeon

2020.title: Halo 1
likes: Clever control scheme that changes FPS on consoles
Skybox of the Halo lets the imagination run wild
dislikes: Many levels have repeated environments and feels dragged on
The flood

2020.title: Hellblade
likes: A haunting headphone experience
Wonderful idea to base a game so rooted into mental health
dislikes: Combat being too easy makes the ending lack impact
The facial capture often looked comical

2020.title: Persona 5 (Royal)
likes: New antagonist's motives are a worthy cause and make him admirable
New combat theme doesn't disappoint
dislikes: Doesn't fix the absurd story events around Futaba
Combat has gotten even easier due to new social options

2020.title: Super Mario 3D Land
likes: Short sweet levels mean the gimmick doesn't start to bore
8 new worlds in the post-game with just as many good levels
dislikes: Mario moves at a slow speed but that might be me being accustomed to Mario Odyssey movement
Not very challenging

2020.title: The Legend of Zelda: The Wind Waker HD
likes: Really nice art style that holds up
The mini-game where the guy yellos SPLOOSH and KABOOM
dislikes: Dungeon designs once again, quite forgettable
Riding in the ocean still kinda blows despite the speed boost
2020.url: img/The Legend of Zelda: The Wind Waker HD.jpg

2020.title: Animal Crossing New Horizons
likes: The sassy lookin animal people hyrbrids
Seeing creative people's houses and islands
dislikes: Almost everything, why did I give this a 6, I hate it
Villagers contribute nothing to the island and feels just like a formula check up

2020.title: Dark Souls 2
likes: A lot of build variety and content in general
DLC shows an improvement in level layout
dislikes: Clearly rushed with scrapped ideas not fleshed out
Deadzone on movement and adaptability stat make just walking feel muddy

2020.title: Divinity Original Sin
likes: Rock/Paper/Scissors mechanic for co-op makes a playthrough very interesting
Towns were full of life and fun quests with branching solutions
dislikes: Combat was very RNG based on debuffs
Environmental hazards were plentiful and boring

2020.title: Fifa 20
likes: Liverpool won the league so that's nice, nothing to do with the game
I got Timo Werner or something, and now he plays for Chelsea and sucks
dislikes: That gambling for kids feature
30fps locked unless you change some crap in a file

2020.title: Hyrule Warriors
likes: So much content for a Musou game
Good difficulty curve on hard difficulty
dislikes: Boss fights are repetitive and lack variety
Loot system is unecessary

2020.title: Kirby Star Allies
likes: It's Kirby and he is shaped like a friend
Crazy ending that is absurd even for a Kirby game
dislikes: The gimmick of this game is extremely dull compared to the Robobot
Very plain levels that didn't stand out

2020.title: Metal Wolf Chaos XD
likes: The voice acting is incredibly bad but also charming
Particle effects are crazy
dislikes: Mission objectives until the end are generic military stuff
UI not been updated to accomodate HD remster

2020.title: Pokemon Alpha Sapphire
likes: Being able to freely fly is a neat addition, that once again, is removed in the next one
Gen 3 still has some of the best routes in a Pokemon game
dislikes: Not including features of Emerald from 15 years ago is the dumbest decision
Art style of characters is hideous

2020.title: Resident Evil 7
likes: Sections with the Baker family and their history are fantastic
Really enjoyed the VHS tape implementations
dislikes: First person horror relies too much on camera gimmicks and taking the player out of control
Ship and mine section are so awful

2020.title: Slay the Spire
likes: Quite addictive
Combat can be very fast which is great for a roguelike
dislikes: Art is so inconsistent that it's hard to believe it's from the same world
RPG elements are unecessary

2020.title: Supraland
likes: Really creative puzzle solutions
Music was really peaceful
dislikes: Too many meme references
Some puzzles overstayed their welcome

2020.title: World of Final Fantasy
likes: Some beautiful environments even if the level paths are linear
All the FF games are portrayed with wonderful care
dislikes: Too much menu managaement for a Pokemon clone
Getting the true ending dragged

2020.title: The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time
likes: Fantastic camera for a N64 game
Gerudo Valley theme is incredible
dislikes: Dungeon designs, like every Zelda game are still boring
I can't stress how much I hate dungeons in Zelda games
2020.url: img/The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time.jpg

2020.title: Dying Light
likes: Parkour and the grappling hook was a fun way to traverse a zombie infested town
Drop-kicking zombies off buildings was a blast
dislikes: Despite the co-op influence, making the ending a single player only level is quite dumb
Durability on weapons

2020.title: Dark Souls 3
likes: Undead Settlement is an excellent starting area but then the game drops hard
Some of the vistas are incredible
dislikes: Not a single original idea to be found throughout the entire game
Poise clearly doesn't work

2020.title: Final Fantasy X
likes: Worldbuilding is unique for a Final Fantasy game and deserves more love
Lulu is a gothic babe
dislikes: The dungeons are so awful I docked 5 points
Blitzball is the worst sport mini-game in a game

2020.title: Metro 2033
likes: Playing with Russian language is a pretty sureal experience as not everything is subtitled
Great AI on some monsters
dislikes: Linear design makes a scary setting seem less scary
Enemy accuracy is ridiculous, even on the easiest difficulty

2020.title: Finding Paradise
likes: Heartwarming story
It didn't cost my wallet too much
dislikes: Ugly art, bad humour
References to anime completely ruins the tone of the game

2020.title: Minecraft Dungeons
likes: It was part of Game Pass
ARPGs is a fun genre to include as a spin-off
dislikes: I honestly can't remember much about this game
Loot was probably underwhelming but I can't remember!

2020.title: Monster Sanctuary
likes: Some monster designs were incredible
Combining metroidvania levels and Pokemon was a neat idea and worked pretty well
dislikes: Monsters were so similar I saw no need to ever change up from a typical set up
A lot of menu management

2020.title: Pokemon X
likes: Pancham, Gogoar and Clawitzer are really good designs
Pokemon is neat
dislikes: Only about 80 new Pokemon but some of the designs were good
Game is over so fast after taking forever to just get 2 badges

2020.title: Titan Quest Anniversary Edition
likes: Unique setting for an ARPG with plenty of unique assets
Classes for an ARPG are also pretty unique
dislikes: Mage classes are awful
Loot is disappointing but mods can fix this

2020.title: Troll and I
likes: Played it as I lost a bet and it's not as bad as everyone says
Ending made me laugh in a way I haven't laughed in years
dislikes: A bug that forced me to redo 75% of the game
Only one save slot is a dumb choice for such a modern (and buggy) game

2020.title: Pokemon Shield
likes: Pokemon designs are a significant step up from Sun/Moon
Wild area was a good concept but poorly executed
dislikes: No dungeons makes the wild area feel so empty and just a wide route
Online raids are clearly implemented to appeal to the Pokemon Go crowd

2020.title: Remnant from the Ashes
likes: Some boss designs were great
It's like Dark Souls but with guns
dislikes: Every area looked the exact same
Healing was slow and everything was a hold button prompt

2020.title: Tokyo Mirage Sessions
likes: Cute fashion for the idols
SMT combat system was implemented well but the Fire Emblem element is nothing
dislikes: Far too long
Towns were disappointing

2020.title: Torchlight 2
likes: Pretty short for an ARPG
Pet system is wonderful and reduces downtime significantly
dislikes: Cooldowns on some skills were 2+ minutes and were lame
Levelling up skills took too long

2020.title: Monster Prom
likes: Received as a joke gift
It's short
dislikes: Egoraptor voices someone
Art is pretty awful

2020.title: Fairy Tail RPG
likes: Character models were good
Nice turn based combat system for an adaptation of a manga
dislikes: Crashes on loading screens
Many things were handled offscreen just to move the plot forward a story arc

2020.title: Earth Defense Force Insect Armageddon
likes: Multiple classes and weapons was fun to switch up
Blowing up buildings was great
dislikes: Not enough variety of insects
It just sucks

2019.title: Super Mario RPG
likes: Geno is so good that he deserves to be in Smash Bros damn it
Music by Yoko Shimomura is fantastic
dislikes: Needs more time with Bowser
Other RPGs on the SNES cant compete and playing this before them was a mistake

2019.title: Resident Evil 4
likes: The merchant
The opening village section is one of the best parts of video game history
dislikes: The ending areas, like a lot of RE games, is significantly worse than the start
QTEs were a bit too modern, which makes no sense

2019.title: Resident Evil 1 Remake
likes: Jill Sandwich
Mansion rooms are varied and full of surprises
dislikes: Getting headshots was finicky
Jill Sandwich

2019.title: Chrono Trigger
likes: Prison break out sequence is only 30 minutes, not 5 hours like modern games
Frog and Robo are great characters
dislikes: Opening chests is worthless for a lot of the game as if you leave them for the future timeline, they get upgraded
Character side quests come very late into the game

2019.title: Castlevania Symphony of the Night
likes: It's not as hard as Super Castlevania
Movement was so smooth it made simply grinding for rare drops fun
dislikes: First part of the game is too easy
Some of the hidden items are so obtuse that I kinda did use a guide for some

2019.title: Bloodborne
likes: Whacking things with the Kirkhammer
Brought back the vampire goth werewolf archtypes into the mainstream that we need in games
dislikes: Framepacing when running along bridges craps itself
Chalice Dungeon co-op connectivity is awful

2019.title: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild
likes: Amount of quick side content in the open world keeps you discovering things
No awful mandatory dungeons
dislikes: The beasts or whatever they are called are basically dungeons but at least they are optional
Durability system while being not bad, can be improved
2019.url: img/The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild.jpg

2019.title: Yakuza Kiwami 2
likes: Beating up the diaper wearing gangsters
Ryuji as a villain was great and isn't spoken about enough
dislikes: Can easily be burnt out if you play Yakuza games so often
No Anri Okita in this one

2019.title: The Witcher 3
likes: So many areas of the game are beautiful and worthy of a painting, especially in Skellige
I like a game that lets me spec in alchemy
dislikes: Nilfgaard quests consist of running all over the massive town
Triss is clearly better than Yennefer and yet people online still debate this

2019.title: Sekiro
likes: Swords clashing sound fx
Excellent bosses
dislikes: English dub is bad
Soundtrack doesn't have a wide range

2019.title: Resident Evil 2 Remake
likes: Ada
Short and sweet and the big bad Mr. X
dislikes: Best part once again in an RE game, is at the start
Random crits is outdated design

2019.title: Pokemon Black 2
likes: Incredible amount of Pokemon to use in a playthrough
The music goes full ham on the drum and bass
dislikes: Like the first game, many of its features can't be used due to no online servers
Almost drags on a bit too long aorund the mid-game

2019.title: Monster Hunter World Iceborne
likes: Helping out new hunters with the 'hunter helper' feature
Raging Brachydios returned to ruin my day
dislikes: Some hitboxes still seem a bit naff
Didn't get a permanent switch up of the Handler to the sassy lady

2019.title: Luigi's Mansion 3
likes: The lighting, graphics and physics for a Switch game were incredible
Every single room was incredibly creative in design and structure
dislikes: Made me feel a dumb dumb during some puzzle parts
Some segments were backtracking previous levels to chase a cat and I can't remember why

2019.title: The Legend of Zelda: Links Awakening DX
likes: I remember liking most of the dungeons, which is rare for a Zelda game
God darn is this game whimsical and charming, with really delightful music
dislikes: One staircase was stupidly hard to find to progress
The dungeon revolving around throwing balls at columns was annoying
2019.url: img/The Legend of Zelda: Links Awakening DX.jpg

2019.title: Grim Dawn
likes: The series of lore notes called Trip South is one of the best I've read in a game
I made it to level on hardcore this year, I think. Or maybe it was 2020
dislikes: Crafting at the blacksmith can cost too much money
Some routes are wide linear corridors meaning finding all the good stuff can take so long

2019.title: Final Fantasy VII
likes: Cosmo Canyon is an area that I will remember until I die, hopefully
Best implementation of the Cid character
dislikes: The story gets a bit too weird as it goes on
I think the Limit Break system is complete garbage

2019.title: Final Fantasy IX
likes: My friend Mike looks a bit like Zidane, even if he disagreed
I watched someone play this game and they provided funny voices for the characters, which made it better
dislikes: Amarant
Amarant deserved to be listed twice

2019.title: Dark Souls 3 (cinders mod)
likes: Fixes a lot of the annoying crap about the base game such as the doll to pass through a dumb fog wall
Adds Bloodborne weapons and Bloodborne is cool
dislikes: Poise still doesn't work. I thinK. I can't remember
It still doesn't fix the story of Dark Souls 3, but it tries

2019.title: Bully
likes: The class mini-game were really fun
Got to live out a fantasy where I was respected by my fellow pupils
dislikes: Ending was quite bad
Time system while neat did feel a bit restrictive when I wanted to explore the town

2019.title: Yakuza Kiwami
likes: Plot is made much better from playing 0 first
Wacky side quest shenanigans
dislikes: While enjoyable, it did seem like a massive drop in quality from 0
Some boss fights were brutally hard that I cheesed with items

2019.title: Xenogears
likes: Really deep mature story that was a bit 2deep4me
Fei is a neat main character who doesn't use a sword but instead punches things
dislikes: Playing this on the PS Classic sucked due to crashes
Any serious story segment is ruined by this dumb looking cute Furby character

2019.title: Xenoblade Chronicles 2
likes: I love the combat and the accompanying hard rock music
Rex is a good boy and deserves the best
dislikes: Blade field skills means unecessary inventory fiddling
Tutorial system isn't great but I am a pro so it didn't affect me

2019.title: Super Mario Maker 2
likes: New music from legendary Koji Kondo is a delight
I attempted to recreate Bloodborne here and it worked well but no one bloody played it
dislikes: For such a online creation heavy game, it sucks it requires Nintendo Switch online, unlike say Dreams
Level creation interface is a slog without the Wii U tablet but they tried

2019.title: Red Dead Redemption 1
likes: I feel bad for John. That wolf deserved better
Dead-eye mechanic made the game too easy
dislikes: Felt like endless desert with nothing of note in the environment
Every mission was pretty much the same

2019.title: Pokemon Heart Gold
likes: Krabby, the best Pokemon, is available early on, and even makes a good HMSlave
I spent about 50 hours plating Voltorb Flip on the toilet (not all at once)
dislikes: New music is a bit of a bummer, especially for Goldenrod City
Pokemon availability in the first region is disappointingly small despite being a remake

2019.title: Marvel Ultimate Alliance 3
likes: An excellent roster of Marvel characters with more post-release
Not too easy or too hard for an isometic beat em up
dislikes: Character designs I thought were real cool had a poor moveset
Aside from the ninja temple level set at night, none of the levels stood out

2019.title: Katana Zero
likes: Really cool vibes with good electronic techno music
Multiple endings is neat but I felt no desire to get more
dislikes: The plentiful of VHS style effects got tiring and became a bit of an eye sore
I wasn't very good at it

2019.title: Fire Emblem Three Houses
likes: Bernadette, Hilda, Marianne, Catherine, Shamir
The music went full ham during boss fights
dislikes: The school aspect never got switched up so running through that ugly environment was very boring
The first half of each of the storylines is sadly the same which sucks when replaying so soon

2019.title: Devil May Cry 5
likes: Nero deserves to replace Dante which I dont think I would ever say about another protege in a game
Putting cowboy hats on every enemy with Dante and then taking a picture
dislikes: Stop it with the Virgil please! Give it a rest!
Navigating the linear elevator heavy tree was disappointing with the possibilities they could do with a deomonic tree

2019.title: Life is Strange 1
likes: I got to let the blue haired girl die as I didn't like her
The writers were not afraid to go too dark with the storyline, which I really appreciate
dislikes: Words like 'hella' appeared very often
A lot of the actions of pupils and teachers were not believable

2019.title: The Legend of Zelda: Link to the Past
likes: Many of the dungeons utilised the outside world environment which is neat and unseen in recent entries
I enjoyed collecting the heart containers even if I missed only one, still bums me out
dislikes: The overworld theme is grating to my ears and I don't care what anyone else things
I don't think I liked a single boss, I can't even remember any
2019.url: img/The Legend of Zelda: Link to the Past.jpg

2019.title: Xenoblade 2 Torna
likes: A new combat system for an expansion is appreciated even if it wasn't needed
Fleshed out the side villains of the base game
dislikes: Had to grind out side quests to unlock main quest progression
Environments for a Xenoblade game was quite generic

2019.title: The Outer Worlds
likes: The commercial elements had excellent design
Nice to see this kind of game made by Obsidian
dislikes: It followed too closely the formula of something like New Vegas despite a year 10 technological gap
I remember something about the types of ammo being 1 of 3 kind being dumb

2019.title: Rage
likes: The hospital sections still to this day look incredible
Giant monsters
dislikes: Spent a lot of time shooting huamn-like enemies in a setting full of potential
I don't remember anything about it

2019.title: Pokemon Sigma Emerald
likes: Gen IV improvements added in a way that isn't frustrating to play through like a lot of roms
Even included some Gen VI features such as the fairy type
dislikes: I guess I played this. I honestly don't remember!
It still doesn't fix the awful music of Gen III

2019.title: Gears 5
likes: It brought back the spooky atmosphere of the first game at the start then immediately dropped it
The drone buddy was a nice feature
dislikes: Ended up feeing very padded out
The ending doesn't offer anything satisfying, meaning we will probably get yet another

2019.title: Fable 1
likes: The child-like humour and whimsical element is something not seen often in games
Really was quite ambitious for an original Xbox game
dislikes: I remember being disappointed by the towns
I could never be bothered to do the talking head door areas

2019.title: Dragon Quest Builders 2
likes: I built a single toilet, suddenly everyone queued up to poop, I collected said poop to further build my empire
I was quite proud of my creations
dislikes: It had a prison breakout sequence that took away all your stuff and lasted 5 hours at least
Far too long

2019.title: Crackdown 3
likes: It's not as bad as everyone said
Terry Crews
dislikes: My friend had issues on his AMD card so we didn't co-op it
A lot of the minor graphical effects that was in the first game suddenly wasn't here

2019.title: Astral Chain
likes: Lappy the Dog
It's the closest we have gotten to a good JoJo's Bizarre Adventure game
dislikes: A lot of the game took place in the same disgusting looking areas
That 'carry 10 scoops of ice cream to the child without getting knocked over' quest was insanely hard

2019.title: Shadow Warrior 2
likes: I got to play Hotline Miami music in the hub area thanks to an arcade machine
Levels were small enough to not have a lot of downtime
dislikes: The enemy designs were repetitive and lakced originality, much like this comment
The Diablo loot system was an unecessary addition

2019.title: Undertale
likes: A really unique combat system
The endings are based on things you do very early on in the game, not just right at the end
dislikes: Bad humour
The worst fanbase

2019.title: Sunset Overdrive
likes: Ratchet and Clank mixed with superheroes was a good continuation for Insomniac Games
The game is based on an energy dirnk which I drink plenty of, but I have not become a monster yet
dislikes: Outdated references such as referencing the website Neogaf
It needed more of a focus on boss fights, not wave based missions

2019.title: Spyro Reignited 1
likes: The levels were small enough to make finding the collectibles exciting
Spyro's design was really great
dislikes: Extremely basic for a modern platformer
I'd rather see a new Spyro than Activision rehash old material, even if going by Crash 4 sales, it won't sell well

2019.title: Sayonara Wild Hearts
likes: The music is pretty great, especially the cover of Clair De Lune
That one level involving 2 people clicking the fingers which changes the environment was really well executed
dislikes: I played this in one sitting while exercising and it was very hard to see stuff on the Switch screen
It reused the same level format multiple times despite being such a short game

2019.title: Puzzle Quest: The Legend Returns
likes: Really comfy game to play in bed
Some battles seemed very unfair
dislikes: Despite being a Bejewled like game, my framerate dropped constantly
I remember having to grind a lot but not sure if that was because it was addictive

2019.title: Portal 2
likes: The two robots you play as in co-op have adorable designs
Valve has great art and technical direction as the game still holds up today
dislikes: Everytime I replay this game, I like it a little bit less
I was never a fan of the comedy style of this game

2019.title: Pokemon Shield
likes: Failinks is a really good design and the best of the game
Wasn't plagued by 10+ legendaries like many of the recent generations
dislikes: Hau sucks, or is it Hop in this game? Both are awful and very much alike
No victory road is an insult

2019.title: Luigi's Mansion
likes: The facial expressions of Luigi is really charming
The names based on Boo puns such as Little Boo Peep, Boohoo, Booris, Bootique
dislikes: A lot of backtracking despite being a small mansion
I played this after LM3 and it couldn't compete, sorry

2019.title: Dark Souls 3
likes: Parrying bosses was satisfying
So many great gestures
dislikes: I got the platinum trophy here and it required so much grinding
Every armour set is brown, with a low quality mesh and texture so nothing stands out
